vulnerable.commit_message:
Merge pull request from GHSA-5x45-qp78-g4p4

* Prevent infinite loop in scanning xml content

* Simplify scanning method

* Optimization
vulnerable.cve_desc: PJSIP is a free and open source multimedia communication library written in the C language. Versions 2.12 and prior contain a denial-of-service vulnerability that affects PJSIP users that consume PJSIP's XML parsing in their apps. Users are advised to update. There are no known workarounds.
